text: Ajmer District is a district in the Indian state of Rajasthan. The city of Ajmer is the district headquarters. Ajmer District has an area of 8,481 km2, and a population of 2,583,052 (2011 census). Three main religions are; Hindu 1,869,044, Muslim 244,341, Jains 47,812. The district is in the center of Rajasthan, and is bordered to the north by the Nagaur District, to the east by the Jaipur, to the south by the Tonk, Bhilwara District, and to the west by the Pali District. ==References== ==Other websites== * Ajmer District website Category:Rajasthan
title: Ajmer district
